name: OOP THE LOOP
description:
Alley-oop the ball into the hoop. Or just click it, whatever.

Just a prototype to get oriented with: 
- Physics
- Touch control
- Scorekeeping
- UI
and publishing.

It needs a lot before it's AAA. If I revisit the project, my first priorities will be: 
- Better camera behavior
- Adjustable controls
- Visual power gauge
- Maybe some music, with on/off toggle of course.

CONTROLS:
Click/touch the ball to build up power.
Release to oop.
The position of your cursor affects the direction of the shot.
